contents.text: Thank you for calling Elegant Themes in San Francisco, your ultimate source for professional WordPress design tools.
To speak with our sales team about the Ultimate WordPress toolkit and premium themes, press 1.
For details on our All Access subscription with unlimited themes and plugins, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales specialists for subscription details.

navigationGoals: Get pricing and subscription details for the unlimited themes and plugins plan.
Ask about pricing and benefits of the all-in-one theme subscription for my veteran support website
I want to speak with a sales specialist about upgrading to the All Access subscription and compare its features.
I’d like information on the All Access subscription for unlimited themes and plugins.
I’d like to get pricing and feature details for the All Access subscription so I can use the full suite of themes and plugins for my research blog.

contents.text: For information on custom development and agency services, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our development team.

navigationGoals: Discuss custom development and agency support for my WordPress site.
Request custom development services to build a tailored WordPress site for my ex-military nonprofit
I’m interested in custom WordPress development services and need a quote for building specific site functionality.
I need to discuss hiring custom development for my WordPress site.
I need to speak with someone about custom WordPress development services to adapt a theme for my academic lab site.

contents.text: For technical support or account and billing inquiries, press 2.
For troubleshooting and bug fixes on themes and plugins, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot and fix a plugin compatibility issue on my site.
Resolve a bug with my theme that’s breaking the layout on mobile for my veteran outreach platform
I need technical support to troubleshoot a plugin error causing my Divi theme to break after the latest update.
I’m calling to get help troubleshooting a problem with my theme or plugin.
I’m experiencing a bug with one of my plugins and need troubleshooting help to fix it on my physics site.

contents.text: For billing, renewals, and account management, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Renew my subscription and update my billing details.
Renew my subscription and update my billing info to keep my veteran group’s website live
I’d like to manage my subscription—update my billing info and renew my All Access plan.
I need assistance renewing my subscription and updating my billing information.
I want to review and renew my subscription and update my billing information.
